Detailed Description

Class CBTEngDevMan

This is a helper class that simplifies the usage of Symbian's BT Device Registry interface

bteng.dll

IMPORT_C TInt CBTEngDevMan::AddDevice ( const CBTDevice &  aDevice  ) 

Add a device into the Bluetooth device registry

Parameters:
aDevice Device to be added.
Returns:
KErrNone if the request was succesful, KErrBusy if there is already an ongoing request or another error code in case of failure.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTEngDevMan::GetDevices ( const TBTRegistrySearch &  aCriteria  ) 

Get an array of devices that match the search pattern from the registry.

Parameters:
aDevice An array of devices where the information will be returned. This pointer must remain valid until the callback is made.
aCriteria Search criteria for the devices to be returned.
Returns:
KErrNone if the request was succesful, KErrBusy if there is already an ongoing request or another error code in case of failure.

IMPORT_C TInt CBTEngDevMan::DeleteDevices ( const TBTRegistrySearch &  aCriteria  ) 

Delete one or more devices that match the search pattern from the registry.

Parameters:
aCriteria Search criteria for the devices to be deleted.
Returns:
KErrNone if the request was succesful, KErrBusy if there is already an ongoing request or another error code in case of failure.
